thread.title: heights at machu pichu

title: heights at machu pichu
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Photo taken from the Wayna (Huayna) Picchu (the peak at Machu Pichu) around 9.00 am. Machu Pichu is the most familiar icon of Inca civilization. The Incas built the estate around 1450, but abandoned it a century later at the time of the Spanish Invasion.It was declared a Peruvian Historical Sanctuary in 1981 and a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1983 
Nobody has marked this note useful
